name: react-jetpack
description: An opinionated toolkit for efficient React.js development
author: thinkholic

scripts.setup: npm install && cd testbed/ && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:webpack && npm run copy:assets && npm run symlink
scripts.symlink: cd dist/ && npm link && cd .. && cd testbed/ && npm link react-jetpack
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run build:webpack:watch" "cd testbed/ && npm start"
